formulas.name: Chlorine (calc-hypo)
formulas.description: Targeted at salt & chlorine pools, this plan takes 6 readings & uses calcium hypochlorite as the sanitizer.

Calcium Chloride

formulas.name: SPA 1800L Uv & Ozone & Sodium Bisulfate (experimental)
formulas.description:
Target for Spa 1800L with only UV & Ozone for sanitation.
This is Experimental. Do not use if you don’t send water sample for testing.

I created this fork to try & replace the muriatic acid with Sodium Bisulfate, per this request:
https://forum.pooldash.com/t/sodium-hydrogen-sulfate/71

treatments.name: Sodium Carbonate
Sodium Bicarbonate
Sodium Bisulfate
Calcium Chloride

formulas.name: Salt Pool
formulas.description:
Targeted at salt pools. 

This recipe will suggest:
Salt Additions
To Shock or Not
To Backwash or Not
Salt Gen Time Increase or Decrease
Phosphate Treatment
Cyanuric Acid
pH
Alkalinity
Calcium Hardness
Chlorine is adjusted via your Salt Generator.

treatments.name: Dichlor Shock
Sodium Carbonate
Sodium Bicarbonate
Muriatic Acid
Calcium Chloride
Cyanuric Acid
Phosphate Remover
NaCl (Salt)
Backwash
Increase Salt Generator
Decrease Salt Generator

formulas.name: Bromine Spa
formulas.description:
This is a recipe for basic Bromine spas. Nothing fancy, just normal maintenance and logging.

Includes Phosphate and Hardness and Cyanuric Acid (some say it is not needed for bromine - debated issue)
Please Report any issues or suggestions to psoup1965

treatments.name: Bromine
Sodium Carbonate
Sodium Bicarbonate
Muriatic Acid
Calcium Chloride
Cyanuric Acid
Phosphate Remover

custom.name: Phosphates
custom.description: Phosphates are nutrients for algae.  Keep levels low.. close to 0 if possible. Nothing is needed until after 100, but can be done to get to 0. Adding too much will cloudy water so go slow.

formulas.name: Spa Marvel + Bromine
formulas.description:
This is a recipe for Bromine spas using a natural sanitizer system, such as Spa Marvel. It assumes you want to keep trace bromine levels of around 0.75 ppm.

This assumes that you're adding the spa marvel product about every 3 months.

treatments.name: Bromine
Sodium Carbonate
Sodium Bicarbonate
Muriatic Acid

formulas.name: ECOsmarte
formulas.description: This recipe is for pools using the ECOsmarte copper / oxidation system. For the dissolved oxygen reading, it assumes the pool's elevation is approximately 1300 ft.

treatments.name: Sodium Carbonate
Sodium Bicarbonate
Muriatic Acid
Calcium Chloride
Increase the Ionizer
Increase the Oxidizer
